channel.title: Possible to upload files to SD card via script or code?
channel.description:
I am looking for a way to do what the "Patch -> Upload to SD Card" does and upload other files from the terminal or via scripting. Is it possible?
I am looking into implementing a menu-system for the OLED screen that would read data from a JSON file (using the jsmn library). Since I will be editing that file a lot, it would be great to automate the uploading.

item.title: Possible to upload files to SD card via script or code?
item.dc:creator: @ivofx Ivo Grigull
item.description:
@ivofx wrote:

It works perfectly, thank you @janvantomme !

Read full topic

item.title: Possible to upload files to SD card via script or code?
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Take a look at the wave/play fn object. This one has a file input attribute which lets you choose a *.wav file to play. As far as I can remember, this object also uploads the sample files to the SD card. Try creating a custom object with a file picker and see if it also uploads JSON files.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to upload files to SD card via script or code?
